overview: All but a prisoner in the exotic Malayan retreat she shares with her Chinese financier husband, Yuan Sing (Paul Lukas), British singer Sadie Merivale (Kay Walsh) begins a dangerous affair with nearby plantation owner Harold Marquess (Wallace Douglas). But when Sing discovers his wifeâ€™s betrayal, he plots to regain his honor by slowly torturing her lover to death.
title: The Chinese Bungalow
